See also: Zahlen and zählen

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

  • Zahl +‎ -en

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈtsaːln̩/, /ˈtsaːlən/
  • audio (Germany)
    		(file)
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)

Verb[edit]

zahlen (third-person singular simple present zahlt, past tense zahlte, past participle gezahlt, auxiliary haben)

  1. to pay (for something).
    Kellner, zahlen bitte! ― Waiter, the bill please!
  2. to pay for, to atone for.
